description:
AÃƒÂ¯yb Dieng - Rhytmagick (1995) 

Senegalese multi-instrumental percussionist Aiyb Dieng has been a regular contributor to albums by Bill Laswell and also to projects by Material, Laswell's constantly shifting avant funk supergroup. So it's only fair that Laswell should serve both as guest bassist and co-producer for Dieng's solo debut, and it's no surprise that they should enlist the help of various other Laswell buddies on the project -- bassist Bootsy Collins, guitarist Nicky Skopelitis, and keyboardist Bernie Worrell are all on board, and there's even a cameo by Last Poets alumnus Umar Bin Hassan.
